settings.label: Basic data
settings.comment:
Your Full Service Payment Provider - Comprehensive solutions from one single source

Wirecard is one of the world's leading providers of outsourcing and white label solutions for electronic payment transactions.

As independent provider of payment solutions, we accompany our customers along the entire business development. Our payment solutions are perfectly tailored to suit e-Commerce requirements and have made us Austria's leading payment service provider. Customization, competence, and commitment.

www.wirecard.at

configuration.label: Configuration
configuration.comment: For integration, select predefined configuration settings or "production" for live systems.

customer_id.label: Customer ID
customer_id.comment: Customer number you received from Wirecard (customerId, i.e. D2#####). More information.

shop_id.label: Shop ID
shop_id.comment: Shop identifier in case of more than one shop. More information.

secret.label: Secret
secret.comment: String which you received from Wirecard for signing and validating data to prove their authenticity. More information.

backendpw.label: Back-end password
backendpw.comment: Password for back-end operations (Toolkit). More information.

serviceurl.label: URL to imprint page
serviceurl.comment: URL on the payment page which leads to the imprint page of the online shop. More information.

shopname.label: Shop prefix in posting text
shopname.comment: Reference to your online shop on your consumer's invoice, limited to 9 characters.

sendadditionaldata.label: Forward consumer data
sendadditionaldata.comment: Forwarding shipping and billing data about your consumer to the respective financial service provider.

sendconfirmationemail.label: Notification e-mail
sendconfirmationemail.comment: Receiving notification by e-mail regarding the orders of your consumers if an error occurred in the communication between Wirecard and your online shop. More information. Please contact our sales teams to activate this feature.

autodeposit.label: Automated deposit
autodeposit.comment: Enabling an automated deposit of payments. More information. Please contact our sales teams to activate this feature.

sendbasketinformation.label: Forward basket information
sendbasketinformation.comment: Forwarding basket data to the respective financial service provider.

payolution_terms.label: payolution terms
payolution_terms.comment: Consumer must accept payolution terms during the checkout process. More information.

pci3_dss_saq_a_enable.label: SAQ A compliance
pci3_dss_saq_a_enable.comment: Selecting "NO", the stringent SAQ A-EP is applicable. Selecting "YES", Wirecard Checkout Seamless is integrated with the "PCI DSS SAQ A Compliance" feature and SAQ A is applicable. More information.

iframe_css_url.label: Iframe CSS-URL
iframe_css_url.comment: Entry of a full URL to a CSS file in order to customize the iframe input fields when the "PCI DSS SAQ A Compliance" feature is used. More information. e.g. https://magento.example.com/skin/frontend/base/default/css/wirecard/checkoutseamless/seamlessiframe.css

showcardholder.label: Display card holder field
showcardholder.comment: Display input field to enter the card holder name in your credit card form during the checkout process.

showcvc.label: Display CVC field
showcvc.comment: Display input field to enter the CVC in your credit card form during the checkout process.

showissuedate.label: Display issue date field
showissuedate.comment: Display input field to enter the credit card issue date in your credit card form during the checkout process. Some credit cards do not have an issue date.

showissuenumber.label: Display issue number field
showissuenumber.comment: Display input field to enter the credit card issue number in your credit card form during the checkout process. Some credit cards do not have an issue number.

wirecard_checkoutseamless_cc.label: Wirecard Checkout Seamless Credit Card / Maestro SecureCode

sort_order.label: Sorting order number
sort_order.comment: This payment method will be displayed depending on the sorting order numbers of other payment methods.

title.label: Name for payment method
title.comment: The name for the payment method to be displayed in the online shop.
